oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT  
REPLACE(c.ORDER_DETAIL_ID, CHR(0), '') AS ORDER_DETAIL_ID
,REPLACE(c.BID_DETAIL_ID, CHR(0), '') AS BID_DETAIL_ID
,REPLACE(c.BIDID, CHR(0), '') AS BIDID
,REPLACE(c.DOCID, CHR(0), '') AS DOCID
,REPLACE(c.ORGNAME, CHR(0), '') AS ORGNAME
,REPLACE(c.SHEET, CHR(0), '') AS SHEET
,REPLACE(c.NAME, CHR(0), '') AS NAME
,REPLACE(c.SPEC, CHR(0), '') AS SPEC
,REPLACE(c.UNIT, CHR(0), '') AS UNIT
,REPLACE(c.TEMP_CNT, CHR(0), '') AS TEMP_CNT
,REPLACE(c.COMP_DIV, CHR(0), '') AS COMP_DIV
,REPLACE(c.PROD_CD, CHR(0), '') AS PROD_CD
,REPLACE(c.STANDARD, CHR(0), '') AS STANDARD
,REPLACE(c.WORK_DT, CHR(0), '') AS WORK_DT
,REPLACE(c.MAPPING_CD, CHR(0), '') AS MAPPING_CD
,REPLACE(c.PRODUCTLEVEL_CD, CHR(0), '') AS PRODUCTLEVEL_CD
,REPLACE(c.PRICE_CD, CHR(0), '') AS PRICE_CD
,REPLACE(c.CNT, CHR(0), '') AS CNT
,REPLACE(c.CHK_PROD_ID, CHR(0), '') AS CHK_PROD_ID
,REPLACE(c.CHK_PROD_DT, CHR(0), '') AS CHK_PROD_DT
,REPLACE(c.CHK_PROD_FLAG, CHR(0), '') AS CHK_PROD_FLAG
,REPLACE(c.SYSTEM_PROD_CH_YN, CHR(0), '') AS SYSTEM_PROD_CH_YN
,REPLACE(c.IF_DATE, CHR(0), '') AS IF_DATE
FROM CD_NEIS.BID_DETAIL b
,CD_NEIS.BID_MASTER a
, CD_NEIS.ORDER_DETAIL c
WHERE a.BIDID = b.bidid
AND b.BID_DETAIL_ID = c.BID_DETAIL_ID
AND a.orgtype = 'S'
AND TRUNC(c.IF_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

preCopyScript.value:
truncate table cd_ods.tb_sf_eat_order_detail_temp;

select 1 as ss;

query.value:
INSERT INTO cd_ods.tb_sf_eat_order_detail
(
 order_detail_id          
  ,bid_detail_id            
	,bidid                    
	,docid                    
	,orgname                  
	,sheet                    
	,name                     
	,spec                     
	,unit                     
	,temp_cnt                 
	,comp_div                 
	,prod_cd                  
	,standard                 
	,work_dt                  
	,mapping_cd               
	,productlevel_cd          
	,price_cd                 
	,cnt               
	,chk_prod_id              
	,chk_prod_dt              
	,chk_prod_flag            
	,system_prod_ch_yn      
)
SELECT order_detail_id          
    ,bid_detail_id            
	,bidid                    
	,docid                    
	,orgname                  
	,sheet                    
	,name                     
	,spec                     
	,unit                     
	,temp_cnt                 
	,comp_div                 
	,prod_cd                  
	,standard                 
	,work_dt                  
	,mapping_cd               
	,productlevel_cd          
	,price_cd                 
	,cnt               
	,chk_prod_id              
	,chk_prod_dt              
	,chk_prod_flag            
	,system_prod_ch_yn      
FROM cd_ods.tb_sf_eat_order_detail_temp
WHERE bidid NOT IN ( SELECT distinct bidid from cd_ods.tb_sf_eat_order_detail );

select 1 as ss;

insert into cd_ods.tb_sf_eat_order_detail_new
select  a.bidid , a."name" , a.spec , b.matching_product_brand, b.matching_product_name, a.unit , a.standard , a.cnt 
, h.price ,  a.cnt*cast(h.price as numeric) as tot_price
, e.item_code , e.item_name,  e.pl1_name, e.pl2_name, e.pl3_name
, case when e.zstatus = '01' then '상온' 
       when e.zstatus = '02' then '냉장'
       when e.zstatus = '03' then '냉동'
       else e.zstatus
       end as storage    
, c.rnk
, g.lctn_sc_nm
, c.brand_bluesis, c.product_name_bluesis 
    from   cd_ods.tb_sf_eat_bid_master d 
 join  cd_ods.tb_sf_eat_order_detail a 
 on d.bidid = a.bidid 
 and to_char(a.if_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD')
  join cd_ods.tb_sf_standard_dataset8 b
 on a.name = b.item_name_eat 
 and a.spec  = b.item_desc_eat 
 and coalesce(b.matching_product_name, '') !=''
  left join (select distinct a.* from  cd_ods.tb_sf_standard_dataset2 a) c
 on b.item_name_fnb  = c.item_name_fnb
 and b.item_desc_fnb  = c.item_desc_fnb 
-- and coalesce (c.item_code_ds,'') != ''
 left join cd_ods.em_ods_m011 e
 on c.item_code_ds  = e.item_code 
 left join cd_ods.tb_mdm_school_info  f
 on d.org_biz_id  = "담당 기관 사업자번호"
 left join cd_ods.tb_sf_neis_school_info_t g
 on f."표준학교코드" = g.sd_schul_code
left join cd_ods.tb_sf_bluesis_product_info_current_t h
 on g.lctn_sc_nm = h.region_new
 and h.brname = c.brand_bluesis 
 and h.pname = c.product_name_bluesis 
 where coalesce(h.price, '') !=''
 ;

select 1 as ss;
